content:
Besides the server roll-out thing, I'd like to discuss the feedback mechanism for an IG.
The goal is to allow people to submit feedback like we do in Jira. I'm using github issues and I think it's a good thing, but I'd like to see ideas on how to atually get there.
What I have is a google form that knows in which content it was called (i.e. in which section of the IG the user pressed the Feedback link), and from there it posts a github issue.
The weakest link there is google forms, because it doesn't support invisible parameters and as such I have to have one google form for each IG.
The google form works in a way that IG users don't need to have a github account.
If we do some Javascript form, I think that will either require the user to be logged in to github,or to expose the github token in code..
Would be nice to hear what others think of the mechanism and how it can be made proper
